node.title: Hunter COVID cases double after superspreader event, majority tipped to be Omicron
node.description: NSW Health says more than a third of the 650 people who checked into the Argyle House nightclub last week have now tested positive.
node.content:
["COVID-19 cases in the Hunter region have almost doubled overnight as the impact of a superspreader event continues.", "NSW Health said more than a third of the 650 people who checked into an event at nightclub Argyle House on Wednesday, December 8 had\u00a0now tested positive.", "There were 415 new cases in the Hunter in the latest reporting period, compared to 216 the previous day.", "New Health said it was\u00a0likely the majority of cases in the Newcastle area would be the Omicron variant.", "The Newcastle local government area recorded the most cases with 243, followed by Lake Macquarie with 76, Maitland with 69 and Port Stephens with 18.", "Cessnock had seven cases and Singleton two.", "", "
Newcastle Knights development player Chris Vae'lia has tested positive to COVID-19.(ABC News: Dan Cox)
", "
Knights player tests positive
", "The Newcastle Knights NRL club sent all players and staff for testing on Monday due to a possible link to the nightclub cluster.", "The Knights confirmed development player Chris Vae'lia had\u00a0tested positive to COVID-19.", "In a statement the club said Vae'lia had been in isolation since Monday and would continue to follow required protocols until he was\u00a0cleared to return to training.", "All other full-time players and essential staff who tested negative returned to training today.", "Yesterday the town's other national sporting team, the Newcastle Jets, revealed a player from the men's side had tested positive.", "The club is working with the A-League and NSW Health in regard to this weekend's game against Macarthur FC.", "
Hospitality sector already seeing impact
", "Newcastle's tourism and hospitality operators are receiving cancellations as the\u00a0outbreak worsens.", "Newcastle Tourism Industry Group president Kent Warren said businesses were cancelling end-of-year functions and restaurant bookings were also diminishing.", "He said many people wanted to increase their chances of being with friends and family for Christmas.", "\"As much as we are disappointed, it is understandable,\" Mr Warren said.", "Some venues have been forced to postpone year 12 school formals because of positive cases.", "Newcastle Lord Mayor Nuatali Nelmes said she welcomed the easing of restrictions in the state\u00a0despite the growing number of cases in the city.", "\"The most important thing to remember at this point in time is to go through the process of getting tested if you need to and isolating, following the health advice and also protecting those most vulnerable in the community,\" she said.", "", "
Hundreds of people have lined up to get tested over the past few days.(ABC Newcastle: Ben Millington)
", "
Schools closed for deep cleaning
", "With just days left until school finishes for the year several schools across the Hunter have been closed due to positive cases.", "The Lambton and Newcastle high schools are closed today for contact tracing and\u00a0deep cleaning.", "St Mary's Primary School in Warners Bay and St Aloysius Primary School in Chisholm are also closed."]
